18.ara-name: كتاب الصيد والذبائح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever acquires a dog - with the exception of a dog to guard livestock, a hunting dog, or a farm dog - each day a Qirat is deducted from his reward

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مَنْ أَمْسَكَ كَلْبًا مَا يَنْقُصُ مِنْ أَجْرِهِ)
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About How Much Is Deducted From The Reward Of One Who Keeps A Dog
